title: Rox Roadmap for 2025
excerpt: A look at our plans for Rox in 2025, including ActivityPub federation and new features.

As we enter 2025, we're excited to share our roadmap for Rox.

Planned milestones:
- Q1: Complete frontend implementation
- Q2: ActivityPub federation
- Q3: Performance optimization
- Q4: Stable release
author: Rox Team
